database.name: VIEW OBUIAPP_POOL_REPORT_V
database.view: (select p.ad_process_id as obuiapp_pool_report_v_id, p.ad_org_id, p.ad_client_id, to_char(p.name) as name, '165' as ad_window_id, p.isactive, p.created, p.createdby, p.updated, p.updatedby from ad_process p where (p.isreport = 'Y' or p.isjasper = 'Y') and ad_process_id not in (select distinct ad_process_id from ad_tab where ad_process_id is not null) ) union (select p.obuiapp_process_id as obuiapp_pool_report_v_id, p.ad_org_id, p.ad_client_id, to_char(p.name) as name, 'FF80818132D7FB620132D8193C0C0043' as ad_window_id, p.isactive, p.created, p.createdby, p.updated, p.updatedby from obuiapp_process p where p.uipattern = 'OBUIAPP_Report') order by name asc
